segments.text: I see the water spilling all over the place, and it’s making me furious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, polishing a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so reckless with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one is doing anything about this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the floor, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at all of them to wake up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and the boy is still reaching for more cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a complete lack of awareness from everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand watching this any longer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
